channel.title: NLP on Damilola John

item.title: I Tried to teach BERT 15 programming languages.
item.description: This is was a fun side project where I decided to build a model that could tell 15 of the most popular programming languages apart We would start with simple machine learning approaches and work our way up to more complex methods till we have a satisfactory solution. The Dataset Our dataset is a csv containing 45,000 samples . The dataset is made up of two columns, the ‘code’ feature contains code snippets we want to classify and the language column, which is our label contains the programming language it belongs to.
